fields.name: salIndex
fields.description: SAL index (only present for indexed SAL components)

fields.name: private_identity
fields.description: Identity of publisher: SAL component name for a CSC or user host for a user

fields.name: error
fields.description: An error code; only relevant if ack=FAILED

fields.name: identity
fields.description: private_identity field of the command being acknowledged

fields.name: origin
fields.description: private_origin field of the command being acknowledged

fields.name: cmdtype
fields.description: Index of command in alphabetical list of commands, with 0 being the first

fields.name: timeout
fields.description: Estimated remaining duration of command; only relevant if ack=INPROGRESS
